content:
The FlexCard Designer is a declarative tool that makes it easy to build user interface (UI) Lightning web components without code. It features a drag interface and WYSIWYG editing, allowing you to build interfaces rich in information and with actions relevant to your customer's context.

With the FlexCard Designer, you can:

* Build your FlexCard on a wide and adjustable Canvas
* Drag customizable elements from the Build panel onto the Canvas
* Adjust the width of any element along a 12-column horizontal grid
* Use the Action element to launch an OmniScript or Flyout
* Customize the look and feel of your FlexCard using the Style panel

You can create a new FlexCard, configure your data source with a step-through wizard, and configure FlexCard-wide settings. You can also debug your FlexCard by viewing its data JSON and response and request logs.

The FlexCard Designer offers various features, including:

* In-Product Help for learning about properties or elements
* Publish Options for configuring metadata values and updating the component SVG icon
* Downloading on and off-platform FlexCard LWCs
* Running FlexCards outside of Salesforce with OmniOut

To get started with the FlexCard Designer, explore its features and see how it can help you build rich interfaces relevant to your customer's context.
title: FlexCard Designer Overview
